page.title: 16TONMAWR - RECREATION 3
page.content: {CRICKET}the village cricket club is an important organisation: a new synthetic cricket pitch has been laid on the newly reclaimed cricket field in the village - and although players have their doubts about a plastic pitch they are pleased not to have to travel to play 'home' matches anymore. The statistical side of cricket is not overlooked: one of the senior committee men uses a home computer to keep track of batting averages and bowling figures. One player -Rhys Maggs- is a fast bowler of sufficient ferocity to be a regular player for the West Wales 11. A junior section is being organised for the boys and will run on similar lines to the junior section of the rugby club. The Cricket Club Barbeque is an annual event missed only by the reckless.
